text: No person shall set up, operate, or conduct any business or device by or in which any person, animal, or living object shall act or be exposed as a target for any ball, projectile, missile, or thing thrown or projected for or in consideration of profit or gain, directly or indirectly.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2841.

1973 Ed., § 47-2343.

DC CODE § 47-2841

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Exposing persons or animals as targets prohibited.
